5c7ca3aec0991a3bee6e1548a3aa046f.caption:
_*New Key Visual and trailer for the Eisen Flugel film, Light Novel by Gen Urobuchi\.

The film will come out soon in Japanese cinemas\.

STAFF
\- Chief Director: Seiji Mizushima \(Shaman King, Fullmetal Alchemist\)
\- Director: Daizen Komatsuda \(BBK/BRNK, Assistant Director in the latest Neon Genesis Evangelion films\)
\- Screenplay: Yukie Sugawara \(Overlord, No Guns Life, Dead Mount Death Play\), Seiji Mizushima
\- Original Character Design: Takashi Takeuchi \(Fate series\)
\- Character Design: Kiminori Ito \(sub character designer by Bucchiri ?\!, Tokyo 24th Ward\)
\- Music: Yuki Kajiura \(Demon Slayer, Madoka Magica\)
\- Animation Studio: A\-1 Pictures
Source: eisen\_\_flugel*_

> _*@Mizuki\_Newsbot*_
